6. Car Light¶

In this project, you will be able to use the remote control to control the RGB light strips on the bottom of the car, making them display different colors.

How to do?

  1. First check that the Upload button is toggled to the side near the motor port.

  2. Open the 6_car_light.ino file under the path of zeus-car-main\examples\6_car_light. Or copy this code into Arduino IDE.

    <代码>

  3. After the code is uploaded successfully, slide the power switch to ON to start the Zeus Car.

  4. Now you can use the numbers 1 to 9 on the remote control to control the car to light up different colors, press 0 to turn off, press to let the car perform a color cycle. Key 1 to 9 corresponding to the color is: red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, blue, purple, pink, white.
